title: Knowledge Products - Philosophy and Science Course Pack
description:
This torrent contains the below three audio courses by Knowledge Products:

* Giants of Philosophy
* Science and Discovery
* World of Philosophy

I take no credit for the two philosophy courses as they have merely been repackaged from other sources. The style of the content is easy going but not flimsy. I would say that the format is somewhere between an audio book and an audio lecture. It's well written, concise and to the point but not overly tedious. And of course, it's not every day you get the chance to listen to someone like Charlton Heston lecturing about ancient Greek philosophy ;)
